chapters.title: Chapter 1: To Keep the Bargain
chapters.info: Kirstian Chalwin, p. 58 (52)—One of the Kin. She sat on the Knitting Circle. She is very strong in the One Power, and because of this was chosen to hold Ispan Shefar's shield during her captivity. She holds a small weaver's shop in Ebou Dar. She actually ran away from the White Tower about three hundred years ago.
